alert.note: Alert for Bland; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tazewell and central Bland counties through 445 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gratton, or near Burkes Garden, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bland... Bluefield... Bastian... Burkes Garden... Clear Fork... Hicksville... and Kimberling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Virginia...and southeastern West Virginia.
